                    Atom a2,
                    int bondStrength,

        a1 - first atom
        a2 - second atom
        bondStrength - single, double, or triple bond
        stereochem - wedged or dashed

      • get

        public Atom get(Atom a)
        Fetches the instance of the atom located within the molecule equivalent to the argument atom.
        Parameters:
        a - an atom equivalent to the desired atom from the molecule
        Returns:
        the instance of the requested atom contained within the molecule

      • isStereocenter

        public boolean isStereocenter(Atom a)
        This function is used by addBond() to determine whether storing the stereochemical relationship should be required/is necessary. An atom is a stereocenter in the conext of a molecule if: - There are 4 atomic groups extending from the atom (no double/triple bonds). - Each of these groups are nonequivalent/unique.
        Parameters:
        a - the atom
        Returns:
        True if is a stereocenter, False if not

      • isAdjacent

        public boolean isAdjacent(Atom from,
                          Atom to)
        Finds if there is a bond from one atom to the other.
        Parameters:
        from - the first atom
        to - second atom
        Returns:
        True if there is a bond, False if none

        Returns:
